name: Ladyfinger
shortDescription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit sed do eiusmod te incididunt
fullDescription: Okra, Abelmoschus esculentus, known in some English-speaking countries as lady's fingers, is a flowering plant in the mallow family native to East Africa. Cultivated in tropical, subtropical, and warm temperate regions around the world for its edible green seed pods, okra is featured in the cuisines of many countries.
